trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around July 2nd 0001
divs: Sighting DetailsGBright white pinprick of light hovered over the fireworks for a while, at timesit moved slowly from west to east then a bit south. Then it hovered again. Itwas obscured by the smoke of the fireworks towards the end. I would haveignored it if it had stayed put, but the change in direction and the slowmovement made me curious. I suppose it could have been a satelite, but I27ve never seen a satelite move like that.
